Key Match Events: Ecuador played most of the match with 10 men after Enner Valencia was sent off in the 22nd minute for a high boot.
Jeremy Sarmiento scored home just before halftime to put Ecuador in front.
Venezuela's goals came from substitutes Jhonder Cádiz and Eduard Bello, with Cádiz scoring in the 64th minute and Bello sealing the win in the 74th minute.
